mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_EMAIL AS memberEmail, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, MEMBER_TEL AS memberTel, NULL AS memberAddress, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS enrollDate, PROFILE_IMG AS profileImg FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MEMBER_DEL_FL = 'N'
SELECT POST_NO AS postNo, 0 AS postWeight, TRANSPORT_STATUS AS transportStatus, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate, 0 AS postPrice FROM POSTAL_ITEM ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
SELECT P.POST_NO AS postNo, 0 AS postWeight, 'Y' AS isPayment, TO_CHAR(P.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS regDate FROM POSTAL_ITEM P ORDER BY P.REG_DATE DESC
